alert.note: Alert for Osage (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued February 16 at 2:53PM CST until February 17 at 6:00PM CST by NWS Tulsa
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING IN EFFECT FROM 4 AM TO 6 PM CST THURSDAY... * WHAT...Heavy snow expected. Total snow accumulations up to 4 inches possible in far northern and northwest Osage county, with 1 to 2 inches elsewhere. Ice accumulations of up to one tenth of an inch possible before the snow. Winds gusting as high as 35 miles an hour. * WHERE...Osage County. * WHEN...From 4 AM to 6 PM CST Thursday. * IMPACTS...Plan on travel impacts. The potentially hazardous conditions may disrupt daily life, with threats to life possible. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Consider delaying travel on Thursday. Motorists should use extreme caution if travel is absolutely necessary.
info.instruction: If you must travel, keep an extra flashlight, food, and water in your vehicle in case of an emergency. For the latest road conditions call 1-844-465-4997 or go to okRoads.org.
